text: Allāhanu, samarūpada, āvartita vacanagaḷiruva atyuttama granthavannu iḷisikoṭṭiddāne. Tam'ma oḍeyana bhakti uḷḷavarige adarinda rōmān̄canavāguttade. Taruvāya avara carmagaḷū (bāhyavū) hr̥dayagaḷū (antaraṅgavū)allāhana nenapineḍege vāli biḍuttave. Idu allāhana mārgadarśana. Avanu tānicchisidavarige saridāriyannu tōruttāne. Innu allāhanē dāri tappisidavanige sari dāri tōraballavaru yārū illa
